plot: You've heard of Sinbad, Aladdin, and Ali Baba? You've got 998 more stories to go! 1001 Nights is an animated series bringing these tales to you in a way that will keep you coming back for more.
plot_en: You've heard of Sinbad, Aladdin, and Ali Baba? You've got 998 more stories to go! 1001 Nights is an animated series bringing these tales to you in a way that will keep you coming back for more.
plot_es: You've heard of Sinbad, Aladdin, and Ali Baba? You've got 998 more stories to go! 1001 Nights is an animated series bringing these tales to you in a way that will keep you coming back for more.
title: 1001 Nights
